name: Molly's Space Nursery
description:
When space parents go to space work their offspring has to stay somewhere. That’s where the best nursery bot in the entire galaxy comes in: Mrs. Molly!

Join Mrs. Molly in her frantic job and care for space babies as demanding as they are cute!

Controls:

  • Arrow keys or left stick: Drive around.
  • Return or start button: (Re)start the game.
  • Space or “A” (X-Box) or “X” (Playstation): Tend to the babies.
  • ESC: Exit the game.

Note: If you have problems with a cropped screen, open the compatibility settings for the .exe and try to change the resolution to 640x480 or disable display scaling. This might fix the problem.
